document_data.caption: A map showing the Rubban's Tears south of Sahu.
document_data.name: Rubban's Tears
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rubban's Tears''' was an archipelago and coral reef system found on the southern end of the island of [[Sahu]] in [[east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: The Rubban's Tears covered roughly {{SI|900|sq mi|k|}} of the [[Crowded Sea]] of the southern coast of Sahu. The archipelago comprised ten islands of various sizes.
document_data.Inhabitants: The coral reefs and waters separating the islands were infested with dangerous [[shark]]s.
